title: (x) Hilton Font - probably custom, similar to Bodoni {Florian}
content:
Does anyone know what font is used here?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150316014149im_/http:/typophile.com/files/HGVC%201_3884.png)
author: dmbrules909

comments.content:
A customized bold Bodoni?  
The square dots and the round ball terminals – smells like Frankenstein. The only static, vertically stressed serif with square dots that comes to my mind is [Lucida Bright](http://web.archive.org/web/20150316014149/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/lucida-bright/).  
F
I think Bodoni is as close if not a definite match. Thanks!
